name: Tokyo Clanpool
storyline:
In near-future Tokyo, a mysterious, upside-down city suddenly appears in the sky.

A tower stretching from the city connects to the National Diet Building, forming the demonic tower known as the “Dark World Diet Tower,” and the monsters that travel through this tower begin to overflow into the city.

Japan, which suffered the devastating blow and is isolated from the outside world, established a new organization in order to rebuild its fallen government and fight against the monsters.

That organization is called the “Cyber Tactics Cabinet.”

The girl who assumes the office of first-generation prime minister of this new cabinet decides to advance into the Dark World Diet Tower in order to strike the enemy at its core.

Leading the cabinet as the “Battle Prime Minister,” she takes on the Dark World Diet Tower with the confidence of the people backing her.
summary:
Tokyo Clanpool is a Dungeon RPG where you’ll take your party of heroines deeper and deeper into the tower to counter the monster threat and learn the truth of its origin. Equip Digiskins to customize characters’ skills and abilities while navigating mazelike corridors in first-person perspective. Turn-based combat is fast and strategic, and with your team’s ether-based powers, you can even float or dig tunnels to alter the structure of dungeons.

But you’ll also have to keep an eye on your citizens’ approval ratings. If your actions are favorable, you can earn valuable bonuses, but if it falls too low, your entire cabinet could resign! Is your administration up to the task?
